title: Eninda tAmadamO
sahitya:
Eninda tAmadamO en ayyanE


anupallavi

  mAnvizhi maithili mAruti anujan tAmpuDai shUzha un darshanam tandiDa


caraNam    varuvEn enru nI maraindE shonnadoru vArttai ninaindu vazhi pArttirundEn
 narumalar vaittumE kAttirundEn pErAnanda vAriyil tiLaittirundEn enrum
 surar paNindiDum un tiruvaDitanil oru iDam pera manadil ninaindirundEn aDimai
 ariyAp-pizhai pala sheidiDinum adai marandu karuNai shurandu parindu enakkaruL iniyum
